recommendations: Sambit Kumar Dash ‚ÄúAkash showed exemplary organising skills in planning and executing the alumni reunion held at the beginning of 2020. This event was attended by more than 150 attendees from various alumni batches, joining from India and from various other locations globally. He was instrumental in liaising with various internal and external contributors, including handling the invitation and registration process seamlessly, logistics of transportation and accommodation, and delivering the event agenda over a packed three day schedule. The entire event ran like clockwork and the entire visiting alumni group provided feedback that this was one of the best events that most of us had experienced recently. Kudos to Akash specifically and the overall Student Alumni Committee for their contribution in delivering an excellent event experience.‚Äù
